title: Elven Obsession
description: The trouble with being an elf is... well, it's complicated! We have to save Christmas magic like my sister Ribbon. Don't even get me started on Clover. Clover has to break a goblin's curse using love and nightshade! Whoever comes up with these recipes needs help.Now, Captain Joren Steele has his hands full with not only a dark-eyed beauty named Pepper, but a king, an evil drow elf, and someone stealing souls! Cayenne has to capture a malevolent fairy, but she finds her attraction to her partner to be a bit distracting to say the least.And finally, Rue. Rue has a difficult choice: should she do as she is commanded or standby as an elf is tortured.Join the elf side...
author: Decadent Kane
